## OrgsAPI.postOrgsIDInvites() method

Creates an invite to an organization. See [https://v2.docs.influxdata.com/v2.0/api/\#operation/PostOrgsIDInvites](https://v2.docs.influxdata.com/v2.0/api/#operation/PostOrgsIDInvites)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```
